required_header.download_date: ClinicalTrials.gov processed this data on May 29, 2018
required_header.link_text: Link to the current ClinicalTrials.gov record.

clinical_study.brief_title: Safety and Efficacy of Telaprevir in Combination With Peginterferon Alfa-2a and Ribavirin in Subjects Co-Infected With Hepatitis C Virus (HCV) and HIV
clinical_study.official_title: A Phase 2a, 2-Part, Randomized, Double-Blind, Placebo-Controlled, Parallel-Group, Multicenter Study of Telaprevir in Combination With Peginterferon Alfa-2a (Pegasys®) and Ribavirin (Copegus®) in Subjects Who Have Chronic HCV-1/HIV-1 Co-Infection and Are Treatment-Naïve for Hepatitis C

brief_summary.textblock: The purpose of this study is to determine whether the combination of telaprevir, peginterferon alfa-2a, and ribavirin is safe and effective in treating hepatitis C virus (HCV) infection in subjects who are infected with both HCV and human immunodeficiency virus (HIV).

study_design_info.masking: Quadruple (Participant, Care Provider, Investigator, Outcomes Assessor)

primary_outcome.measure: Proportion of Subjects Achieving Undetectable HCV RNA at Week 12
primary_outcome.time_frame: 12 weeks after first dose of study drug

secondary_outcome.measure: Proportion of Subjects Achieving Undetectable HCV RNA at Week 4 and Week 12
secondary_outcome.time_frame: 4 and 12 weeks after the first dose of study drug
secondary_outcome.description: number of subjects with undetectable HCV RNA

secondary_outcome.measure: Proportion of Subjects Who Have Undetectable HCV RNA 12 Weeks (SVR12) and 24 Weeks (SVR24) After Last Planned Dose of Study Treatment
secondary_outcome.time_frame: 12 weeks after last dose of study drug

secondary_outcome.measure: Effect of Efavirenz-based (EFV) and Atazanavir-based (ATV/r) Highly Active Antiretroviral Therapy(HAART) on Telaprevir Exposure
secondary_outcome.time_frame: through 12 weeks after first dose of study drug

secondary_outcome.measure: Median Trough Plasma Concentration (Ctrough) Ratios of Efavirenz and Tenofovir (Part B Only, Subjects on EFV-based HAART)
secondary_outcome.time_frame: through 12 weeks after first dose of study drug
secondary_outcome.description: Ctrough ratio of HAART medication with telaprevir (test) and without telaprevir (reference)

secondary_outcome.measure: Median Trough Plasma Concentration (Ctrough) Ratios of Atazanavir (ATZ), Ritonavir, and Tenofovir (Part B Only, Subjects on ATV-based HAART)
secondary_outcome.time_frame: through 12 weeks after first dose of study drug
secondary_outcome.description: Ctrough of HAART medication with telaprevir (test) and without telaprevir (reference)

arm_group.description: The dose of ribavirin used (fixed versus weight-based) is region dependent
The dose of ribavirin used (fixed versus weight-based) is region dependent

intervention.description: Tablet, Oral, 750 mg or 1125 mg, q8h, 12 weeks
Subcutaneous injection, 180 μg, once weekly, 48 weeks
Tablet, Oral, 1000 mg for subjects weighing <75 kg or 1200 mg for subjects weighing ≥75 kg, b.i.d., 48 weeks

criteria.textblock:
Inclusion Criteria:
- Chronic, genotype 1, hepatitis C with detectable HCV RNA
- HIV-1 infection for >6 months
- Documentation of a liver biopsy within 1 year before the screening visit showing evidence of hepatitis (demonstrated by inflammation and/or fibrosis)
Exclusion Criteria:
- Previous treatment with any approved or investigational drug or drug regimen for the treatment of hepatitis C
- Previous treatment with interferon or ribavirin
- Evidence of hepatic decompensation in cirrhotic subjects
- Subjects who have participated in a clinical study involving administration of an investigational drug within 2 months
- Part A only: subjects who have been on a HAART regimen within 12 weeks before study start

group.title: Part A: T/PR
group.description: Drug: telaprevir tablet, oral, 750 mg, q8h, 12 weeks Biological: peginterferon alfa-2a subcutaneous injection, 180 μg, once weekly, 48 weeks Drug: ribavirin (fixed dose) tablet, oral, 800 mg, b.i.d., 48 weeks Drug: ribavirin (weight-based dose) tablet, oral, 1000 mg for subjects weighing <75 kg or 1200 mg for subjects weighing ≥75 kg, b.i.d., 48 weeks The dose of ribavirin used (fixed versus weight-based) was region dependent.

group.title: Part A: Pbo/PR
group.description: Drug: placebo tablet, oral, 750 mg, q8h, 12 weeks Biological: peginterferon alfa-2a subcutaneous injection, 180 μg, once weekly, 48 weeks Drug: ribavirin (fixed dose) tablet, oral, 800 mg, b.i.d., 48 weeks Drug: ribavirin (weight-based dose) tablet, oral, 1000 mg for subjects weighing <75 kg or 1200 mg for subjects weighing ≥75 kg, b.i.d., 48 weeks The dose of ribavirin used (fixed versus weight-based) was region dependent.

group.title: Part B: EFV-based HAART + T/PR
group.description: Drug: efavirenz, tenofovir disoproxil fumarate, and emtricitabine Drug: telaprevir tablet, oral, 750 mg, q8h, 12 weeks Biological: peginterferon alfa-2a subcutaneous injection, 180 μg, once weekly, 48 weeks Drug: ribavirin (fixed dose) tablet, oral, 800 mg, b.i.d., 48 weeks Drug: ribavirin (weight-based dose) tablet, oral, 1000 mg for subjects weighing <75 kg or 1200 mg for subjects weighing ≥75 kg, b.i.d., 48 weeks The dose of ribavirin used (fixed versus weight-based) was region dependent.

group.title: Part B: EFV-based HAART + Pbo/PR
group.description: Drug: efavirenz, tenofovir disoproxil fumarate, and emtricitabine Drug: placebo tablet, oral, 750 mg, q8h, 12 weeks Biological: peginterferon alfa-2a subcutaneous injection, 180 μg, once weekly, 48 weeks Drug: ribavirin (fixed dose) tablet, oral, 800 mg, b.i.d., 48 weeks Drug: ribavirin (weight-based dose) tablet, oral, 1000 mg for subjects weighing <75 kg or 1200 mg for subjects weighing ≥75 kg, b.i.d., 48 weeks The dose of ribavirin used (fixed versus weight-based) was region dependent.

group.title: Part B: ATV/R-based HAART + T/PR
group.description: Drug: ritonavir-boosted atazanavir, tenofovir disoproxil fumarate, and emtricitabine or lamivudine Drug: telaprevir tablet, oral, 750 mg, q8h, 12 weeks Biological: peginterferon alfa-2a subcutaneous injection, 180 μg, once weekly, 48 weeks Drug: ribavirin (fixed dose) tablet, oral, 800 mg, b.i.d., 48 weeks Drug: ribavirin (weight-based dose) tablet, oral, 1000 mg for subjects weighing <75 kg or 1200 mg for subjects weighing ≥75 kg, b.i.d., 48 weeks The dose of ribavirin used (fixed versus weight-based) was region dependent.

group.title: Part B: ATV/R-based HAART + Pbo/PR
group.description: Drug: ritonavir-boosted atazanavir, tenofovir disoproxil fumarate, and emtricitabine or lamivudine Drug: placebo tablet, oral, 750 mg, q8h, 12 weeks Biological: peginterferon alfa-2a subcutaneous injection, 180 μg, once weekly, 48 weeks Drug: ribavirin (fixed dose) tablet, oral, 800 mg, b.i.d., 48 weeks Drug: ribavirin (weight-based dose) tablet, oral, 1000 mg for subjects weighing <75 kg or 1200 mg for subjects weighing ≥75 kg, b.i.d., 48 weeks The dose of ribavirin used (fixed versus weight-based) was region dependent.

participants_list.participants: 1 subject was randomized but not dosed
1 subject was randomized but not dosed

drop_withdraw_reason.title: Unable to come to study follow-up visits

baseline.population: All randomized subjects who received at least 1 dose of study drug

group.title: Part A: T/PR
group.description: Telaprevir plus peginterferon alfa-2a and ribavirin for 12 weeks, followed by 36 weeks of peginterferon alfa-2a and ribavirin. Subjects not receiving HAART.

group.title: Part A: Pbo/PR
group.description: Placebo plus peginterferon alfa-2a and ribavirin for 12 weeks, followed by 36 weeks of peginterferon alfa-2a and ribavirin. Subjects not receiving HAART.

group.title: Part B: EFV-based HAART + T/PR
group.description: Telaprevir plus peginterferon alfa-2a and ribavirin for 12 weeks, followed by 36 weeks of peginterferon alfa-2a and ribavirin. Subjects receiving concomitant efavirenz(EFV)-based highly active antiretroviral therapy(HAART) for the entire 48 week study.

group.title: Part B: EFV-based HAART + Pbo/PR
group.description: Placebo plus peginterferon alfa-2a and ribavirin for 12 weeks, followed by 36 weeks of peginterferon alfa-2a and ribavirin. Subjects receiving concomitant efavirenz(EFV)-based highly active antiretroviral therapy(HAART) for the entire 48 week study.

group.title: Part B: ATV/R-based HAART + T/PR
group.description: Telaprevir plus peginterferon alfa-2a and ribavirin for 12 weeks, followed by 36 weeks of peginterferon alfa-2a and ribavirin. Subjects receiving concomitant ritonavir-boosted atazanavir(ATV/r)-based highly active antiretroviral therapy(HAART) for the entire 48 week study.

group.title: Part B: ATV/R-based HAART + Pbo/PR
group.description: Placebo plus peginterferon alfa-2a and ribavirin for 12 weeks, followed by 36 weeks of peginterferon alfa-2a and ribavirin. Subjects receiving concomitant ritonavir-boosted atazanavir(ATV/r)-based highly active antiretroviral therapy(HAART) for the entire 48 week study.

certain_agreements.pi_employee: Principal Investigators are NOT employed by the organization sponsoring the study.
certain_agreements.restrictive_agreement: The only disclosure restriction on the PI is that the sponsor can review results communications prior to public release and can embargo communications regarding trial results for a period that is more than 60 days but less than or equal to 180 days. The sponsor cannot require changes to the communication and cannot extend the embargo.
